text: Raajathanthram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Anil Chandra and starring Jagadish and Innocent in the lead roles. ==Cast== *Jagadish as Balachandran Keshava Menon * Innocent as Madhavan Nair * Jagathy Sreekumar as Attuvassheril Prathapashimham *Saikumar as Rameshan * Kalabhavan Mani as Adv. P.K. Shivakumar * Kalpana as Damayanthi * Narendra Prasad as Keshava Menon *Chithra as seethalekshmi * Kanakalatha as Keshava Menon's wife *Kaveri as Renu * Kochu Preman as Advocate *Manju Pillai as Balachandran's sister * Praveena * Sajith ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Raajathanthram
